amendment.description: Amendment sought to exclude from the committee's jurisdiction all rules and regulations that undergo a cost-benefit analysis as a part of existing regulatory requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-213 to exclude from the committee's jurisdiction all rules and regulations that undergo a cost-benefit analysis as a part of existing regulatory requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 254 (Roll no. 734).
